Articles.Content:
I present the "Magellan 2". She's a beast.

356.375 tons.

46 crew capacity.

6516 m/s of DV.

Only 104 parts. 

I designed this monster to take massive amounts of crew and cargo to Duna and even further. I also wanted to make a thinkable amount of living space for the extremely long voyage. Has 5 1.25m docking ports used to haul landers and small base modules. She will make her maiden voyage soon to a nearby asteroid to make sure no issues arise.  Download can be provided but the ship is divided into 3 subassemblies. 

Mods (might be missing some):

Near Future Solar

Near Future Construction

FTP

Taurus Command Capsule

Stock-a-like Station Parts

Centrifuge (not sure what mod name is)

KW Rocketry?

 

 

 

Edited March 11, 2016 by Jackvony

Impressive ship!

I'm planning to build a similar kind of mothership myself when 1.1 is out. Hopefully my Computer/KSP will then be able to handle such big constructions without crashing.

2 hours ago, Drelam said:

Impressive ship!

I'm planning to build a similar kind of mothership myself when 1.1 is out. Hopefully my Computer/KSP will then be able to handle such big constructions without crashing.

Yea she's a bit laggy. Once I get 1.1 I'll load her up with a bunch of base modules to take to Duna. She's on her way home from marking an asteroid now
